commit message:
- Fix DownloadService to hash chapter URLs when constructing a directory.
- Fix MangaEden (EN) and MangaEden(ES) chapter numbering.

Update README.md

Added direct download link.

- Fixed DownloadService stopping on new queue.
- Fixed MangaPresenterOfflineImpl to refresh chapter listings on read.
- Fixed QueuePresenterImpl to refresh download queue on resume.

- Abstracted Views by extending them from base Views.
- Activities and Fragments implementing the views did not change their definitions as I consider them volatile classes unique of representation.

- Abstracted Mappers by extending them from Base Mappers.
- Activities and Fragments implementing the mappers did not change their definitions as I consider them volatile classes unique of representation.
- Fixed synchronization of inserting new downloaded manga when chapters finish downloading simultaneously.

- Added Immersive Mode for API 19+.
- Fixed TextView error in fragment_chapter_help.xml regarding enclosing HTML into a Spannable.
- DatabaseService now runs on an IO thread.
- Updated application's versionCode for new APK.
- Updated application's versionName for new APK.

- Optimized imports.
- Added @SuppressLint('WrongCall') to let release build pass.

- Removed IO thread from DatabaseService, as it extends IntentService, the extra thread was not required.
- Added an new thread to DownloadService's onStartCommand.
- External downloads are now hidden from MediaScanner.

- MangaService is no longer a Singleton with one OkHttp client. Each call to MangaService will create a new OkHttp client.
- Do not build to release until suspicions are dealt and verified.
- Removed OkHttp from Glide. Reason is referenced in Issue #5.
- Added a check for whether an external storage is mounted when enabling the option in the preferences.

- Updated RxJava.
- Reverted MangaService back to a Singleton with a static temporary instance method for the DownloadService.
- Changed how the DownloadService sizes its ThreadPool.
- Made Contract, Utils, and Manager classes have private constructors.
- Download path's no longer include chapter names because I can't guarantee the length of the path to be less than the Linux's maximum.
- Hacked fix for Issue #4 according to http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3551821/android-write-to-sd-card-folder.

- Fixed Parceable bug for a lot of models.
- Implemented feature request Issue #11.

- Images in PageFragment are now transformed to make sure that they are within the bounds of the OpenGLRender maximum texture size.
- Added a setting in preferences to control the view type.

- Images in PageFragment are now transformed to make sure that they are within the bounds of the OpenGLRender maximum texture size.
- Added a setting in preferences to control the view type.
- Added hardware acceleration for the viewer.

- Images in PageFragment are now transformed to make sure that they are within the bounds of the OpenGLRender maximum texture size.
- Added a setting in preferences to control the view type.
- Added hardware acceleration for the viewer.
- Fixed Issue #4 for Android versions 4.4 and onwards.
- Added null checks in getStorageDirectories() in DiskUtils.
- Upgraded Glide to 3.5 while integrating OkHttp as a module.
- Query chapters of a manga now accepts an isAscending parameter.
- Removed OkHTTP integration from Glide 3.5; it still does not work as expected.
- Previous commit to fix Issue #21 had a flaw. This is a new fix.
- Improved parsing performance from MangaHere (EN), MangaHere (ES), and MangaReader (EN).

- Improved querying performance.
- Improved catalogue performance through pagination to prevent CursorWindow being too full.
- New setting to clear latest manga.
- Added page selection dialog when reading chapters.
- Updated Glide to 3.5.1 to fix a fatal bug.
- Downgraded Glide to 3.4.0 instead of 3.5.1 just in-case new bugs might appear.
- Added page number indicator in Immersive Mode.
- Images for chapters are no longer scaled if smaller than the texture size limits to improve quality of images in response to Issue #23.
- Scale all trivial images from all the grids and lists for faster loading of images.
- Updated Glide to 3.5.1 to pre-load images to original size.
- Updated local database. It now has Batoto (EN) for Issue #24.
- Added Batoto (EN) as a source for Issue #24.
- Sources which load each page for the image url now batches them in parallel to decrease load time for Issue #5.

Fix for Issue #17 (Bug in Samsung 4.2.2 devices)

Work around from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24809580/noclassdeffounderror-android-support-v7-internal-view-menu-menubuilder

- The on-screen controls in the viewer are no longer translucent.
- The Palette prefers darker colours before lighter colours.

Merge pull request #30 from antonrufino/patch-1

Fix for Issue #17 (Bug in Samsung 4.2.2 devices)
- Updated ProGuard configuration from merged Pull Request #30 to fix Issue #17.

Set The ArrayList Size

Setting the size of the ArrayList beforehand saves memory as ArrayLists double in size each time the array is extended.

Merge pull request #32 from dulleh/patch-1

Set ArrayList Size When Initialized + Code Redudancies

Tinypng-ed Icons

Ran the 'drawable-nodpi', 'drawable-xhdpi' and 'drawable-xxhdpi' images
through tinypng.com - a lossy file compressor. Other folders weren't run
through because they only led to ~15% gains as they were already small
in size (compared to ~50% gains on these folders).
Smaller file sizes, should make for a somewhat smaller apk. I don't see
any change in visual quality but I'm committing to a new branch just in
case.

Merge pull request #34 from dulleh/tinypng-icons

Tinypng-ed Icons
- Fixed a bug with MangaEden sources incorrectly parsing latest updates.
